sentences.sContent: But in many ways the picture in Washington may be deteriorating.
sentences.sContent_eng: But in many ways the picture in Washington may be deteriorating.
sentences.sCn: 但是在华盛顿，许多方面的情况可能是在恶化。

sentences.sContent: In my point of view, we are in a prime time to curb the problem from deteriorating.
sentences.sContent_eng: In my point of view, we are in a prime time to curb the problem from deteriorating.
sentences.sCn: 我认为，现在已经到了控制这个问题进一步恶化的成熟时机。

sentences.sContent: If you raise the issue of your father's deteriorating health and he changes the subject, you can try to gently raise it again, without pressuring him.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you raise the issue of your father's deteriorating health and he changes the subject, you can try to gently raise it again, without pressuring him.
sentences.sCn: 如果你向父亲提出了他健康恶化的问题，而他却改变了话题，你可以试着温和的再次把问题提出来，而不要强迫他。
